scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const src=path.join('node_modules','pdfjs-dist','build','pdf.worker.min.js'); const dst=path.join('public','pdf.worker.min.js'); if(fs.existsSync(src)){ fs.mkdirSync('public',{recursive:true}); fs.copyFileSync(src,dst); console.log('Copied pdf.worker to public/'); } else { console.log('pdf.worker not found at',src); }"
